answers.answer: Yes I just had my sugar test yesterday. You need the test to make sure you don't have Gestational Diabetes.  Be careful because my sugar test made me dizzy afterwards.
Try having it cold! Mine wasn't bad at all. This test IS mandatory, there's no way around it.
Yes you only have 5 minutes to drink it ... To me it wasnt bad at all it actually tastes good in my opinion .. I dranked it in about 3-4 min

question: So I went to the lab to do the sugar test and I couldn't. Glup down the drink in 5 mins... I felt like throwing up!!! What am i going to do? Is this test mandatory?
title: sugar test
